title: AWESOME Oddity - Pink Bordered T210-8 Old Mill for Sale!  ** SOLD!! **

posts.post_title: AWESOME Oddity - Pink Bordered T210-8 Old Mill for Sale!  ** SOLD!! **
posts.post_content:
I've seen lots of Orange and a few Yellow-bordered t210s, but this is the first Pinkish / Salmon colored one I've seen.  It's a Series 8, which is interesting because most of the color-variations on the borders seem to be in Series 3.

Asking $325 delivered.

Thanks in advance!
Brian
